lowercase_char_in_pass: Password must contain at least a lower case english character.
number_in_pass: Password must contain at least a digit.
username_first_char_error: Username must start with an english character.
username_invalid_chars: Username must contain only english characters, dot and underline.
username_length_error: Username's length must be between 6 to 20 characters.
repeat_pass: Repeat password must match the password you entered.
